snippet: The decision was made after the event failed to find an alternate site after losing its previous location at the Fairfield County Hunt Club in Westport, Conn.
abstract: Fairfield County Concours d'Elegance, collector-car weekend in Connecticut, will not be held in 2012 because its organizing body has failed to find an alternate site after losing the Fairfield County Hunt Club in Westport, Conn, where the event had been held. (S)d
lead_paragraph: THE consulting group formed by the directors of the Fairfield County Concours d'Élégance, the collector-car weekend in Connecticut that traditionally ends the concours season in the Northeast, announced last week that the event would not take place this year. The decision was made after the group failed to find an alternate site after losing the Fairfield County Hunt Club in Westport, where the event had been held since 2007.
